text: Jilani (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ): “Mum’bendani Allah kapena mum’bendani Ar-Rahmân, nilina lililyose lyachimum’bendele (yalumope), ligongo Jwalakwe jukwete mena gambonembone.” Soni nkanyanyikaga nnope ni (Qur’an ja pa) swala jenu kapena kutulusya nnope maloŵe, nambo kuyani litala lya chilikati chayalakweyo
